actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of a National Aviation Week.

summary.text: Requests the President of the United States to issue an annual proclamation designating the week of August 19 as "National Aviation Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of a National Aviation Week.
